dtliExcerpt: The three performers mesh together beautifully, with Harris providing just the right haughty snobbishness, Cannavale making comic exasperation into an art form, and Corden so lovable and vulnerable you can almost forget how nasty he can be to waiters in real life.

Cannavale making comic exasperation into an art form, and Corden so lovable and vulnerable.
